It's the {@LinkCreature:39#110#guardian ovoliths} that really make me shudder. Can you hear them? I can. Even when I'm asleep.

I can't go out there and kill them, but I'd reward the one who would.

Bring me their hearts so I know they're dead.

Every heart means one fewer of them.

Maybe I'll be able to dream of something else now. Take this in thanks.
Have you killed the {@LinkCreature:39#110#guardian ovoliths}? Do any still live?
